mapper.select: SELECT A.ID , A.EMAIL , A.NICKNAME , B.NAME AS RANK , A.POINT , COUNT(C.ATTEND_AT) AS ATTENDANCECOUNT , A.CREATED_AT AS CREATEDATE FROM MEMBER A JOIN MEMBER_RANK B ON A.RANK_ID = B.ID JOIN MEMBER_ATTENDANCE_HISTORY C ON A.ID = C.MEMBER_ID WHERE A.ID = #{id}

SELECT A.ID , A.EMAIL , A.NICKNAME , B.NAME AS RANK , D.NAME AS ROLE , A.POINT , A.REPORTED_COUNT AS REPORTEDCOUNT , A.STATUS AS STATUS , A.CREATED_AT AS CREATEDAT FROM MEMBER A JOIN MEMBER_RANK B ON A.RANK_ID = B.ID JOIN MEMBER_ROLE C ON A.ID = C.MEMBER_ID JOIN ROLE D ON C.ROLE_ID = D.ID WHERE A.ID = #{id}
